Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:MDA-MB-231 (60 ± 0.07% Growth inhibition=40 μM; IC50=40.7 ± 3 μM); HeLa (IC50=38.5 ± 4 μM); HepG2 (IC50=44.0 ± 3 μM); PANC-1 (IC50=44.5 ± 0.7 μM); A431 (IC50=47.5 ± 4 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:36 ± 3.7% Hemolysis=375 µM; IC50=36 ± 3.7 µM
